German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

an- +‎ bieten

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʔanbiːtn̩/, /ˈʔanbiːtən/
  • audio (Germany)
    		(file)
  • Audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

anbieten (class 2 strong, third-person singular simple present bietet an, past tense bot an, past participle angeboten, past subjunctive böte an, auxiliary haben)

  1. to offer, to provide

present participleanbietend

du botest anihr botet andu bötest anihr bötet an

imperativebiete an (du)bietet an (ihr)
